main event: An unidentified object was observed wobbling and disappearing at a 30-degree elevation in the south after a 3-10 minute observation.
interesting points: The object crossed azimuth 240 degrees from west to east at 2 SF flight,The object displayed wobble and slight oscillation,The observation lasted for 3 to 10 minutes,The witness was watching stars and reported the object was hovering,The report comes from a consulting engineer, LT Colonel James Crites.
witness description: LT Colonel James Crites, age 29, consulting engineer from Arlington Heights, Illinois
